speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Oft
               
              have
               
              I
               
              heard
               
              that
               
              grief
               
              softens
               
              the
               
              mind

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
And
               
              makes
               
              it
               
              fearful
               
              and
               
              degenerate
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Think
               
              therefore
               
              on
               
              revenge
              ,
               
              and
               
              cease
               
              to
               
              weep
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
But
               
              who
               
              can
               
              cease
               
              to
               
              weep
               
              and
               
              look
               
              on
               
              this
              ?

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Here
               
              may
               
              his
               
              head
               
              lie
               
              on
               
              my
               
              throbbing
               
              breast
              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
But
               
              where’s
               
              the
               
              body
               
              that
               
              I
               
              should
               
              embrace
              ?

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
What
               
              answer
               
              makes
               
              your
               
              Grace
               
              to
               
              the
               
              rebels’
               
              supplication
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
I’ll
               
              send
               
              some
               
              holy
               
              bishop
               
              to
               
              entreat
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
For
               
              God
               
              forbid
               
              so
               
              many
               
              simple
               
              souls

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Should
               
              perish
               
              by
               
              the
               
              sword
              !
               
              And
               
              I
               
              myself
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Rather
               
              than
               
              bloody
               
              war
               
              shall
               
              cut
               
              them
               
              short
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Will
               
              parley
               
              with
               
              Jack
               
              Cade
              ,
               
              their
               
              general
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
But
               
              stay
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              read
               
              it
               
              over
               
              once
               
              again
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Ah
              ,
               
              barbarous
               
              villains
              !
               
              Hath
               
              this
               
              lovely
               
              face

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Ruled
              ,
               
              like
               
              a
               
              wandering
               
              planet
              ,
               
              over
               
              me
              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
And
               
              could
               
              it
               
              not
               
              enforce
               
              them
               
              to
               
              relent

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
That
               
              were
               
              unworthy
               
              to
               
              behold
               
              the
               
              same
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Lord
               
              Saye
              ,
               
              Jack
               
              Cade
               
              hath
               
              sworn
               
              to
               
              have
               
              thy
               
              head
              .

speaker: SAYE
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              but
               
              I
               
              hope
               
              your
               
              Highness
               
              shall
               
              have
               
              his
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              madam
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Still
               
              lamenting
               
              and
               
              mourning
               
              for
               
              Suffolk’s
               
              death
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
I
               
              fear
               
              me
              ,
               
              love
              ,
               
              if
               
              that
               
              I
               
              had
               
              been
               
              dead
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Thou
               
              wouldst
               
              not
               
              have
               
              mourned
               
              so
               
              much
               
              for
               
              me
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
No
              ,
               
              my
               
              love
              ,
               
              I
               
              should
               
              not
               
              mourn
              ,
               
              but
               
              die
               
              for
               
              thee
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
How
               
              now
              ,
               
              what
               
              news
              ?
               
              Why
               
              com’st
               
              thou
               
              in
               
              such
               
              haste
              ?

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
The
               
              rebels
               
              are
               
              in
               
              Southwark
              .
               
              Fly
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              !

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
Jack
               
              Cade
               
              proclaims
               
              himself
               
              Lord
               
              Mortimer
              ,

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
Descended
               
              from
               
              the
               
              Duke
               
              of
               
              Clarence’
               
              house
              ,

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
And
               
              calls
               
              your
               
              Grace
               
              usurper
              ,
               
              openly
              ,

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
And
               
              vows
               
              to
               
              crown
               
              himself
               
              in
               
              Westminster
              .

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
His
               
              army
               
              is
               
              a
               
              ragged
               
              multitude

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
Of
               
              hinds
               
              and
               
              peasants
              ,
               
              rude
               
              and
               
              merciless
              .

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
Sir
               
              Humphrey
               
              Stafford
               
              and
               
              his
               
              brother’s
               
              death

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
Hath
               
              given
               
              them
               
              heart
               
              and
               
              courage
               
              to
               
              proceed
              .

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
All
               
              scholars
              ,
               
              lawyers
              ,
               
              courtiers
              ,
               
              gentlemen

speaker: MESSENGER
text:
They
               
              call
               
              false
               
              caterpillars
               
              and
               
              intend
               
              their
               
              death
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
O
              ,
               
              graceless
               
              men
              ,
               
              they
               
              know
               
              not
               
              what
               
              they
               
              do
              !

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
My
               
              gracious
               
              lord
              ,
               
              retire
               
              to
               
              Killingworth

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
Until
               
              a
               
              power
               
              be
               
              raised
               
              to
               
              put
               
              them
               
              down
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
Ah
              ,
               
              were
               
              the
               
              Duke
               
              of
               
              Suffolk
               
              now
               
              alive
              ,

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
These
               
              Kentish
               
              rebels
               
              would
               
              be
               
              soon
               
              appeased
              !

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Lord
               
              Saye
              ,
               
              the
               
              traitors
               
              hateth
               
              thee
              ;

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Therefore
               
              away
               
              with
               
              us
               
              to
               
              Killingworth
              .

speaker: SAYE
text:
So
               
              might
               
              your
               
              Grace’s
               
              person
               
              be
               
              in
               
              danger
              .

speaker: SAYE
text:
The
               
              sight
               
              of
               
              me
               
              is
               
              odious
               
              in
               
              their
               
              eyes
              ;

speaker: SAYE
text:
And
               
              therefore
               
              in
               
              this
               
              city
               
              will
               
              I
               
              stay

speaker: SAYE
text:
And
               
              live
               
              alone
               
              as
               
              secret
               
              as
               
              I
               
              may
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Jack
               
              Cade
               
              hath
               
              gotten
               
              London
               
              Bridge
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
The
               
              citizens
               
              fly
               
              and
               
              forsake
               
              their
               
              houses
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
The
               
              rascal
               
              people
              ,
               
              thirsting
               
              after
               
              prey
              ,

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
Join
               
              with
               
              the
               
              traitor
              ,
               
              and
               
              they
               
              jointly
               
              swear

speaker:
SECOND
               
              MESSENGER
text:
To
               
              spoil
               
              the
               
              city
               
              and
               
              your
               
              royal
               
              court
              .

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
Then
               
              linger
               
              not
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              .
               
              Away
              !
               
              Take
               
              horse
              !

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Come
              ,
               
              Margaret
              .
               
              God
              ,
               
              our
               
              hope
              ,
               
              will
               
              succor
               
              us
              .

speaker:
QUEEN
               
              MARGARET
text:
My
               
              hope
               
              is
               
              gone
              ,
               
              now
               
              Suffolk
               
              is
               
              deceased
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              HENRY
text:
Farewell
              ,
               
              my
               
              lord
              .
               
              Trust
               
              not
               
              the
               
              Kentish
               
              rebels
              .

speaker: BUCKINGHAM
text:
Trust
               
              nobody
              ,
               
              for
               
              fear
               
              you
               
              be
               
              betrayed
              .

speaker: SAYE
text:
The
               
              trust
               
              I
               
              have
               
              is
               
              in
               
              mine
               
              innocence
              ,

speaker: SAYE
text:
And
               
              therefore
               
              am
               
              I
               
              bold
               
              and
               
              resolute
              .
